RelatedSentence: May 19 ( Reuters ) - U.S. regulators have approved a new non-caloric sweetener from Japan 's Ajinomoto Co that can be used as a substitute for sugar or high fructose corn syrup in foods and beverages .

A1: powder is made from aspartame and vanillan
RelatedSentence: Called advantame , the white powder is made from aspartame and vanillan and is approved as a general - purpose sweetener and flavor enhancer in food , except meat and poultry , the Food and Drug Administration said .
FDA said the product can be used as a tabletop sweetener or in baked goods , non-alcoholic beverages , frozen desserts , jams and jellies , chewing gum and other foods .
